channel.title: Check this band (Not mine)
channel.description:
If you like metal, check the band "Fisthammer"
They are a local band from Downingtown, PA (In america of course) ;)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JirPjy8y9Tw[/youtube]
Check there album "Devour All You See"
They are all great people, The 2nd guitarist gives me guitar lessons, and the drummer gives me drum lessons.
Max - guitar Kevin - Guitar Danny - Drums Jeff - Former bass player.
[url=http://www.facebook.com/fisthammerband]http://www.facebook.com/fisthammerband[/url]
There not like the stereotypical "Nu-Metal" bands... They are the shit.
Look em up.

have to say it sounds like a watered down version of kalmah but with more stereotypical vocals
